item.title: Running With Your Computer
item.description: You were probably told not to run with scissors as a kid, and as an adult, you’ve likely realized that running with a computer isn’t the best idea either. Dropping a desktop computer, especially an old bulky one, would be a disaster. Even dropping a laptop while rushing down a hallway can lead to a hefty repair bill. This isn’t about running with your computer, though. It’s about exercising while using it.
